bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Application for Monitoring Liquid-Immersed Transformers and Components
IEEE Draft Guide for Application for Monitoring Liquid-Immersed Transformers and Components
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC57.143/D20, Apr 2008

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This guide covers identification of the key parameters that can be monitored for obtaining an indication of the condition of liquid-immersed transformers. It also covers risk/benefit analysis, sensor application, and monitoring systems application. This guide does not cover interpretation of monitoring results.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
